channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Drain is blocked and smells pretty bad, possible health hazard, 20th May
item.description:
This drain was cleared last year but I’m afraid it’s blocked again. We have tried clearing it with buckets of water but no joy.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 104, Fairview Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Long deep pothole approx 10 feet in length, 20th May
item.description:
The state of the entire road up to the junction of Bouncers Lane is terrible. Been very poor for at least 18 months. Every car driver swerves to avoid and buses slow. Its a safety hazard.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Priors Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken glass and litter everywhere, 20th May
item.description:
Broken glass in goal post of Children’s park and play area. Also full of litter which I see toddlers trying to pick up.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Newdawn Place, Arle, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vehicles blocking pavement, 20th May
item.description:
Happens regularly, this has caused a few issues for people with mobility and impairment issues, forcing them to walk on the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27, Cotswold Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Builders waste, 20th May
item.description:
Builders waste left in grass next to roadside, bricks, door etc

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockhampton Lane, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cycle path/footpath overgrown, 20th May
item.description:
The trees and hedges are so overgrown cycling on this path is becoming increasingly dangerous as there is no longer space for pedestrians and bikes.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6,7,8,9, Foxmoor, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown hedges blocking cycle path, 20th May
item.description:
The hedges are so over grown there is barely room to pass as a pedestrian. This path is also a cycle path and a route to nearby school, due to overgrown hedges it is becoming dangerous to pass, especially if anyone is waiting at the bus stop
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6,7,8,9, Foxmoor, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous Parking, 19th May
item.description:
The owner of this van routinely leaves it parked in dangerous and inconsiderate locations. This corner is difficult enough for the buses to negotiate, and visibility is seriously reduced.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 30, Seneca Way, Arle, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti on bus stop, 19th May
item.description:
Graffiti on bus stop not covering any times

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 41, Folly Lane, St Paul’s, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two trees missing from the green., 19th May
item.description:
Two trees have disappeared from the area. They look like they've either been cut down or vandalised. Can you help us understand what has happened to them please?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Lynworth Place, Whaddon, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead Hedgehog, 19th May
item.description:
Dead hedgehog in the carriageway. I saw her at 4.30am and again at 9.30am today.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 95, Tennyson Road, St Mark's, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti on bus stop timetable, 19th May
item.description:
Graffiti on bus stop timetable. Can see timings clear

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 121 Saint Paul's Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Weeds on newcourt road, 18th May
item.description:
There is a very significant weed problem on Newcourt road at the base of the wall which encloses the Pinetrees & Shrublands estate. The weeds stretch for some two hundred yards and are substantial in height. This is a very narrow road and the width of the weeds makes it even narrower for passing traffic as well as being very unsightly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 19 Pinetrees, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The whole top end of Priors Road, 18th May
item.description:
Road surface totally gone along length of top end of road. It’s now dangerous as you have to swerve to avoid and with oncoming traffic
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Bettridge Court Priors Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned recycling boxes, 18th May
item.description:
2 recycling boxes, left on pavement at junction of Glencairn Park Road and Glencairn Court (GL50 2NB). Been there a couple of months, not claimed despite several recycling collections made in the meantime.. Need removing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 21 Glencairn Park Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Manhole sinking, 18th May
item.description:
Manhole sinking causing problems for drivers
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A436, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Massive pothole, 18th May
item.description:
Huge pothole on the curve of the road has been there for several weeks - someone has put a cone on it but that isn't going to protect our tyres.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Salterley Grange Salterley Grange, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More potholes, 18th May
item.description:
A large amount of potholes, particularly on the brow of the hill, making driving very difficult.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Hartley Lane, Cheltenham

item.title: Road in very bad condition, 18th May
item.description:
Road full of potholes making driving very dangerous
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Hartley Farm Hartley Lane, Cheltenham

item.title: Cushion dumped, 18th May
item.description:
A black cushion - sofa cushion?- has been dumped in the woods/hedges on the side of the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cheltenham
